Our Team

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Blackhorn Team is aligned around a singular goal: invest in and serve best-in-class founders using digital infrastructure to accelerate the energy transition to drive outsize returns for our LPs. Our team has deep experience across the industries we serve; we’ve been allocators, operators, regulators, (and Governors). We’ve taken SaaS companies to IPO, helped major automotive OEMs launch new electric platforms, sold companies in the construction industry, and built renewable energy projects. Collectively we’ve invested in more than 250 industrial technology companies and have had more than 25 exits. This is what we love to do.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”7px” module_id=”Trevor” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Our TeamThe Blackhorn Team is aligned around a singular goal: invest in and serve best-in-class founders using digital infrastructure to accelerate the energy transition to drive outsize returns for our LPs. Our team has deep experience across the industries we serve; we’ve been allocators, operators, regulators, (and Governors). We’ve taken SaaS companies to IPO, helped […]

yoast_head_json.title: Team » Blackhorn Ventures
yoast_head_json.og_description: Our TeamThe Blackhorn Team is aligned around a singular goal: invest in and serve best-in-class founders using digital infrastructure to accelerate the energy transition to drive outsize returns for our LPs. Our team has deep experience across the industries we serve; we've been allocators, operators, regulators, (and Governors). We've taken SaaS companies to IPO, helped […]
